content: After #79609 got my attention again, I filtered all P-high stable-to-stable regressions that more or less are in progress / waiting for a feedback: filtered view

I wonder what can be done about them: check if they're still a problem (e.g. ping reporter)? Ping the relevant team/wg and try to get some eyeballs on it again? Deprioritize them in case the situation changed/improved/was mitigated since the reporting date?

cc: @Wesley Wiser @simulacrum any thoughts about that? Is there a pattern we can apply to these issues? Or rather should they be re-read and one by one get the context and see what to do?
(sorry simulacrum for the mention, probably better @pnkfelix can help me out here)

I would personally prefer to not ping reporters, but rather check ourselves or close if that's not possible.

Priority wise it's hard to say, likely pretty dependent on the particular bug.
